casebody.data:
COYOTE SPRINGS INVESTMENT, LLC, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Rob Bare, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Jason King, State Engineer, State of Nevada, Department of Conservation and National Resources, Division of Water Resources; and Las Vegas Valley Water District, Real Parties in Interest. No. 76806 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 17, 2018

Dismissed.
